title: SRG Body Textures for Skyrim
description:
These are high quality textures made for UNP based bodies. There is also an optional CBBE file included (main mod still required).

Screenshot: http://i4.photobucket.com/albums/y149/Vendayn/15342092530_f8d53b2c83_b.jpg

Features


- Shapes inspired by SG for a youthful appearance, yet with my re-balanced texture work from Real Girls Realistic.

- Texture resolutions available up to 4K. Optional 2K face options included.

- Choice between a freckled face texture and a clean one. Three body texture styles, with optional muscled normal maps.

- No or barely any seams. The optional SRG05 body texture has seams, but most of the time aren't visible. Only in body-exposing poses will they show.

- Details have been carefully added and balanced for the ultimate in realism. Details show up as you get closer, and decrease as you move away!

- Real Girls Realistic's amazingly detailed lips, using a trick with the normal map, for that awesome creased and full look.

- The diffuse texture's skin tone is just about right to preserve all the detail, without ending up with very dark faces.

- Detailed smooth cheeks for a youthful yet realistic appearance (Yes! You can have both now!).

- Smooth yet detailed. Age 20-30.

- And other smaller details! 


And if you want to download more mods, screenshots (some NSFW), check out my site
 
http://skyrimvendayn.blog.fc2.com/
